CustomField.description: Specifies whether the event is directed to the end user, indicates a business rule violation, or indicates an internal error. Used to determine the amount of detail shown to the end user.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies whether the event is directed to the end user, indicates a business rule violation, or indicates an internal error. Used to determine the amount of detail shown to the end user.
CustomField.label: Level
